rows.label: fev11_400_150_msg0001
rows.name: It's good to see you again, everyone.

rows.label: fev11_400_150_msg0002
rows.name:
Hugo. Have you finished surveying
the battleground?

rows.label: fev11_400_150_msg0003
rows.name:
We have. And we came upon
something of grave importance.

rows.label: fev11_400_150_msg0004
rows.name:
You're looking a bit pale there, Hugo.
Are you all right?

rows.label: fev11_400_150_msg0005
rows.name: I'm just...a little tired, that's all.

rows.label: fev11_400_150_msg0006
rows.name:
I'm not surprised. The Shiyan
resistance fought so desperately,
they really took it out of us.

rows.label: fev11_400_150_msg0007
rows.name:
The battleground was a terrible sight
to behold.

rows.label: fev11_400_150_msg0008
rows.name:
How many more lives must Metsu
wrest from us? We must do all we
can to avenge them.

rows.label: fev11_400_150_msg0009
rows.name: It is truly tragic...

rows.label: fev11_400_150_msg0010
rows.name: We'll put a stop to it.

rows.label: fev11_400_150_msg0011
rows.name:
Come on. They repaired Lett Bridge
while you were away. I think it's time
for us to move on.

rows.label: fev11_400_150_msg0012
rows.name:
Move on? Have you discovered
where Metsu will strike next?

rows.label: fev11_400_150_msg0013
rows.name:
Indeed. We had our suspicions, and
now they've been confirmed. His target
is Iira... The capital, no less.

rows.label: fev11_400_150_msg0014
rows.name:
Can we trust the veracity of the
source?

rows.label: fev11_400_150_msg0015
rows.name:
I believe we can. The Holy See's
intelligence is likely to be on the mark.

rows.label: fev11_400_150_msg0016
rows.name:
Our info is coming from the Deacon,
then? In that case, I believe we have
little room for doubt.

rows.label: fev11_400_150_msg0017
rows.name: The capital, huh? That's a long way.

rows.label: fev11_400_150_msg0018
rows.name:
It is. Once we're over Lett Bridge, we'll
have to cross the Dannagh Desert.

rows.label: fev11_400_150_msg0019
rows.name:
What do you want to do Sata?
You can stay here if you want.

rows.label: fev11_400_150_msg0020
rows.name:
We can have one of the wardens
look after him.

rows.label: fev11_400_150_msg0021
rows.name: ...I'll go with you.

rows.label: fev11_400_150_msg0022
rows.name:
Are you sure? Sooner or later, we'll
end up facing Metsu... It's a dangerous
road that lies before us.

rows.label: fev11_400_150_msg0023
rows.name: I'm! Going! With you!

rows.label: fev11_400_150_msg0024
rows.name: Satahiko.

rows.label: fev11_400_150_msg0026
rows.name: ...What should we do?

rows.label: fev11_400_150_msg0027
rows.name:
Thinking about it now, there is no
guarantee that his staying here would
assure his safety.

rows.label: fev11_400_150_msg0028
rows.name:
He may in fact be safer in our
company, is that not so?

rows.label: fev11_400_150_msg0029
rows.name: Talk about twisting a person's arm...

rows.label: fev11_400_150_msg0030
rows.name: Fine. We're all going to the capital.

rows.label: fev11_400_150_msg0031
rows.name:
Are you sure this is what you want
Satahiko?

rows.label: fev11_400_150_msg0101
rows.name: Hugo, I have a proposal for you.

rows.label: fev11_400_150_msg0102
rows.name: Oh yes?

rows.label: fev11_400_150_msg0103
rows.name:
I've been thinking, after the sparring
match with Laura yesterday..

rows.label: fev11_400_150_msg0104
rows.name:
Wouldn't we also make better use
of our skills if we passed around our
weapons the way she does?

rows.label: fev11_400_150_msg0105
rows.name: How about it? Want to give it a go?

rows.label: fev11_400_150_msg0107
rows.name: Perhaps it's worth a try.

rows.label: fev11_400_150_msg0108
rows.name:
Laura has access to Shin and Kasumi's
weapons when fighting.

rows.label: fev11_400_150_msg0109
rows.name:
It's sure to open up her options
in battle.

rows.label: fev11_400_150_msg0110
rows.name:
I do think it would be wise for us to
learn from her. Especially given our
coming battle with the Grail.

rows.label: fev11_400_150_msg0111
rows.name: So we're agreed!

rows.label: fev11_400_150_msg0112
rows.name: Hikari, I'd like to try using your sword.

rows.label: fev11_400_150_msg0113
rows.name: Mind if I borrow it?

rows.label: fev11_400_150_msg0114
rows.name: It's all yours.

rows.label: fev11_400_150_msg0115
rows.name:
I doubt you're gonna do as well
as those three, though.

rows.label: fev11_400_150_msg0116
rows.name: Strangely humble of you.

rows.label: fev11_400_150_msg0117
rows.name: That's not what I meant...

rows.label: fev11_400_150_msg0118
rows.name:
Actually, forget what I said. We're
gonna knock this out of the park!

rows.label: fev11_400_150_msg0119
rows.name: Now that's more like it!

rows.label: fev11_400_150_msg0120
rows.name:
Kagutsuchi, Wadatsumi. You may not be
convinced at first, but give it time and
we will reap the rewards.

rows.label: fev11_400_150_msg0121
rows.name: As you wish, Your Majesty.

rows.label: fev11_400_150_msg0122
rows.name:
I would never question your authority,
Your Majesty.

rows.label: fev11_400_150_msg0123
rows.name:
Thank you. I am blessed to have
such faithful attendants.

rows.label: fev11_400_150_msg0124
rows.name: Let's make tracks, people!

rows.label: fev11_400_150_msg0125
rows.name: We'll be right with you!

rows.label: fev11_400_150_msg0126
rows.name: Onwards then, to the capital!

rows.label: fev11_400_150_msg0127
rows.name: Shall we let him come with us, then?
